content: So Dumb question. I've never seen something like this tulip system before. Whats the appropriate etiqute for asking a new question? Currently i see only two streams, and I am not sure that either of them work for a general QnA

Hi Cole - to the left of the screen should be a list of streams. If you mouse over the word 'stream' then click on the gear icon you'll see a list of streams that you can subscribe to. The 'Implementer' stream is often the best place if there isn't a more specific stream for your question...

First do a search to see if your topic has already been discussed - or if there's already a related "topic" to ask under. Ask under a related task if there is one. If there isn't, just label the topic appropriately and ask away
message of the day seems to be "double check the thread title before posting"!!!
